pageContext.claim: “We can't let this happen. Maybe you'll have a re-vote, but I don't think that's appropriate. When those votes are corrupt, when they're irregular, when they get caught, they're terminated. And I very easily win, in all states, I very easily win these swing states, just like I won them at 10 o'clock in the evening, the evening of the election -- So we're not looking to show you 25 faulty or fraudulent votes which don't mean anything because it doesn't overturn the state. Or 50 or 100. We're showing you hundreds of thousands, far more than we need, far more than the margin, far more than the law requires.”
pageContext.analysis: The Trump campaign was never able to identify enough votes to overturn the results in any swing state.
